desc: This course surveys standard data structures and algorithms with emphasis on implementation experience and complexity analysis. Topics include algorithmic strategies, fundamental computer algorithms, stacks, queues, lists, trees, hash tables, specialized trees (e.g., binary, AVL, B-trees), heaps and priority queues, compression, and decompression. Prerequisites: Completion of BTS-T; Computer Science 231 and either Computer Science 125 or 251, or consent of the instructor.
name: Algorithms/Data Struc
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Completion of BTS-T; Computer Science 231 and either Computer Science 125 or 251, or consent of the instructor.
title: Algorithms and Data Structures
